properties.entry: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTHDATE , GENDER , DELETE_DATE , DELETE_STATUS , BLACKLIST_STATUS , REPORT_COUNT , DELETE_REASON FROM MEMBER )A )B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTHDATE , GENDER , DELETE_DATE , DELETE_STATUS , BLACKLIST_STATUS , REPORT_COUNT , DELETE_REASON FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? )A )B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTHDATE , GENDER , DELETE_DATE , DELETE_STATUS , BLACKLIST_STATUS , REPORT_COUNT , DELETE_REASON FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME = ? )A )B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTHDATE , GENDER , DELETE_DATE , DELETE_STATUS , BLACKLIST_STATUS , REPORT_COUNT , DELETE_REASON FROM MEMBER WHERE Phone = ? )A )B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTHDATE , GENDER , DELETE_DATE , DELETE_STATUS , BLACKLIST_STATUS , REPORT_COUNT , DELETE_REASON FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE BLACKLIST_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTHDATE , GENDER , DELETE_DATE , DELETE_STATUS , BLACKLIST_STATUS , REPORT_COUNT , DELETE_REASON FROM MEMBER WHERE BLACKLIST_STATUS = 'Y') A) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
